name: Power Slurper
description:
This game was made for the Kenney Game Jam in 2 Days. The theme for the game was grow.

In this game, you are a plane that must consume power juice and grow. But enemy ships try and stop you from achieving that goal. Try to consume as much juice as possible.

Controls:

Move Forward with W or UP Arrow

Rotate with A/D or RIGHT/LEFT Arrow

Assets were all made by Kenney. Code and concept was made by me in the duration of the jam.
